TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit StreamingRequestHandler extends Microsoft.Bot.Streaming.RequestHandler

Docs.summary: A request handler that processes incoming requests sent over an IStreamingTransport and adheres to the Bot Framework Protocol v3 with Streaming Extensions.

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class and establishes a connection over a WebSocket to a streaming channel.
Docs.remarks:
The audience represents the recipient at the other end of the StreamingRequestHandler's streaming connection. Some acceptable audience values are as follows:
- For Public Azure channels, use .
- For Azure Government channels, use .
